resources:
Real Time Weather Location APP This application is created by TOMA Victoria and SILITRĂ Mihai-Andrei dedicated for Real Time Weather Location Traffic System, carried out under their draft license. HC-05 Google Maps Terminal Bluetooth is not available! Bluetooth is OFF Bluetooth is ON Choose the bluetooth device Go to bluetooth settings No paired devices! 47.640323 26.244470 code temp hum airQ Send to DataBase Connect Disconnect Status: Received: Message to send: get data Send command Please select one device! Check the bluetooth connection. Development No connected device. Development mode. Send custom and valid data to database using the above fields. Connected to %1$s. Connecting to %1$s… Disconnected from %1$s. You choose Auto selected Invalid coordinates! Must be as hint format, latitude between -90:90 and longitude between -180:180 Invalid code. Must be between 100 and 499. Invalid temperature. Must be between -50 and 50. Invalid humidity. Must be between 0 and 100. Invalid air. Must be between 0 and 100. Invalid data! Sent data to database. All fields must be completed! "DataBase error: %1$s" DataBase Region %1$s (%2$s) Temperature Humidity Air quality Sunny Sun Heat Soft rain Moderate rain Torrential rain Soft wind Moderate wind Torrential wind Soft snow fall Moderate snow fall Massive snow fall Unknown Region Temperature: %1$.1f\u2103: Humidity: Air quality: %1$.1f%% Show DataBase content Hide DataBase content CLEAR Waiting for data… Message sent. Loading… … Connecting to bluetooth device. Disconnecting from bluetooth device. Connection failed! Message received. [%1$s] %2$s Send data to database in background? You need to connect to a bluetooth device! You need to connect to a bluetooth device to do so! Send %1$s to your current region. Settings Info Stefan cel Mare University Suceava Application details OK FIESC 2020 Device disconnected! Something wrong happened when accessed device name. Please wait! Commands Bluetooth commands to send: EXPAND GPS module is not working. The location on this phone is not working. GPS module is not working. \nLocation on this module is not working. \nCan\'t send data to database!\n [HH:mm:ss] "Not connected!" Region: Read/Write to %1$s failed! Warning
Default device is %1$s Value is %1$s Value is /%1$s Not set.
Bluetooth Device Main device Bluetooth receive delimiter Bluetooth receive state delimiter Default map zoom Max region zoom

Bluetooth device is OFFLINE.\nGo to main screen if you want to send data. Change the map type. Active track location. The current region weather.
